r.d: Interface to eBay's XML-API. It provides objects that are able to communicate with eBay as well as models that help you working with the return values like User or Item models. The Services_Ebay class provides a unified method to use all objects.
r.n: Welcome Carsten Lucke as a new developer! - started implementting flexibible caching system (schst) - added ProductFinder model and calls, requires XSL extension (schst, amt) - added GetHighBidders call (luckec) - added GetMemberMessages call (luckec) - added GetCategory2CS (schst) - added GetPromotionRules() (schst)
